mapper.insert: insert into lm_bill(billmonth,cyclestartbalance,cycleendbalance,cyclebuyamount,quantity ,minconsumequantity,shouldwateramount,minconsumamount,realbillamount,createtime,state, settletype,factorycode,lifecode,meterid,userid,systemid,settleid,priceid,operName) select #{value},m.balance, m.balance ,0,0,p.minconsumequantity, p.minconsumequantity * pd.price1,p.minconsumequantity * pd.price1,p.minconsumequantity * pd.price1, SYSDATE(),2,1,m.factorycode,m.lifecode,m.id,m.userid,m.systemid,p.settleid,p.id, '定时任务生成无数据账单' from lm_meter m , lm_price p , lm_pricedetail pd where m.pricecode = p.`code` and p.id = pd.priceid and m.opened = 1 and not exists (select 1 from lm_bill b where b.meterid = m.id and b.billmonth = #{value})
mapper.update: update lm_bill b set b.cycleendbalance = b.cycleendbalance - ( b.minconsumamount - ( b.minconsumamount *b.quantity/b.minconsumequantity ) ), operName = CONCAT('账单补扣最低消费', ( b.minconsumamount - ( b.minconsumamount *b.quantity/b.minconsumequantity ) ) ) where b.billmonth = #{value} and b.minconsumequantity > b.quantity and ( operName not like '账单补扣最低消费%' or operName is null )

update lm_bill b set b.cyclebuyamount = (select IFNULL(SUM(p.payamount),0) from lm_payment p where DATE_FORMAT(p.createtime,'%Y%m' ) = billmonth and p.meterid = b.meterid ) where b.billmonth = #{value}
